specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Performance Thermal Resistance Thermal resistance helps block the transfer of heat, keeping warmth in and cold out. It improves insulation and enhances comfort in cold weather. Durable Chlorine Resistance Durable chlorine resistance allows the fabric to withstand repeated exposure to chlorine without fading or breaking down, making it ideal for swimwear and other water-related uses. Grin-through Reduction Grin-through reduction helps prevent spandex or inner layers from showing through when the fabric is stretched. It improves color depth and fabric coverage, enhancing the garment’s overall appearance. Brand Yarn Creora® Creora® is a spandex with high power and excellent heat resistance, which maintains its fabric power even setting at high temperature or re-dyeing. In particular, this offers outstanding deeper color and better fastness, dyed with disperse dye stuff. Recommended Use Activewear, Leggings
